name: easy soap cozy
sizes_available: one size to fit a standard sized soap
notes:
this crochet soap cozy pattern is a quick and satisfying make, perfect for advanced beginners who want to practice texture and shaping. 
the cozy gently exfoliates while helping your soap last longer, and the handy loop makes it easy to hang in the shower. 
a fun, practical project that’s great for gifts or everyday use.

it works up super fast and it’s easy enough for an advanced beginner as it has a full step-by-step photo tutorial, exclusively available on my blog [here][1].

you can also download a **print friendly version** (completely free) from my ravelry store.

**difficulty:** 		adavanced beginner/intermediate

**finished size:** 		this pattern has one size, enough to fit a standard sized soap

**materials needed:** 
•	4 mm (g+) hook *(i used clover amour)*
•	hobbii friends cotton 8/6 in white (01): 	15 grams (35 yards/ 32 metres) 
•	yarn needle for weaving in ends
•	scissors
•	stitch markers

**us terms** used throughout.

**no chart/diagram available!**

i hope you’ll love it as much as i loved creating it!

***happy crocheting!***

*krisztina*

  [1]: https://kamecrochet.com/2019/07/09/easy-soap-cozy-pattern/
